alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Norfolk, southwestern Suffolk, southeastern Worcester, southern Middlesex, northwestern Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Medfield, or near Norwood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Boston, Brockton, Quincy, Weymouth, Braintree, Natick, Randolph, Franklin, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Milton, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Dedham, Walpole, Mansfield and Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
